mapper.select: select expense_id , empno , usagePlace , edate , expense_status , modify_dtm as modifyDtm from expense_TABLE where 1=1 and empno = #{empno} and delYn = 'N' order by expense_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into expense_TABLE(expense_id, empno, usagePlace) values (expense_TABLE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{empno}, #{usagePlace})
mapper.select: select expense_id, usagePlace, quantity, edate from expense_TABLE where expense_id=#{expense_id}
mapper.update: update expense_TABLE set usagePlace=#{usagePlace} where expense_id=#{expense_id}
update from expense_TABLE set delYn='Y' , modify_dtm = sysdate where expense_id=#{expense_id}
update expense_TABLE set expense_status='1' , modify_dtm = sysdate where expense_id=#{expense_id}
update expense_TABLE set expense_status='2' , modify_dtm = sysdate where expense_id=#{expense_id}
